G

GeneralInformationRepository - Class in hippodrome
Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
GeneralInformationRepository(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.
generateAbility() - Static method in class stage.Simulator
Generate a value for representation of pair Horse/Jockey's ability.
generateDistance() - Static method in class hippodrome.actions.Race
Generate a distance for the race.
generateMoney() - Static method in class stage.Simulator
Generate money between a value of 1 and 999.
getAbility() - Method in class entities.HorseJockey
Returns the pair Horse/Jockey maximum ability to move forward on its track of the Racing Track.
getAbility() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the current ability of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey).
getAmount() - Method in class hippodrome.actions.Bet
Gets the amount of money spent on this bet.
getAmountOfMoney() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.Spectator
Get the current amount of money collected by this Spectator.
getBetAmount() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.Spectator
Get the current amount of money spent betting on a pair Horse/Jockey.
getBetSelection() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.Spectator
Get the current bet selection performed by this Spectator on a pair Horse/Jockey which runs at the racing track.
getCurrentRaceDistance() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Gets the value of the race distance.
getDistance() - Method in class hippodrome.actions.Race
Gets the distance of this track's race.
getFinalStandPosition() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the final standing position of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey) on the run, as it terminates.
getHorseJockeyId() - Method in class hippodrome.actions.Bet
Gets the number identification of a specific pair Horse/Jockey on this bet.
getIdentification() - Method in class entities.HorseJockey
Returns the pair Horse/Jockey number identification.
getIdentification() - Method in class entities.Spectator
Returns the Spectator numerical identification between all the others Spectators.
getIdentification() - Method in class hippodrome.actions.Race
Gets the identification of this race.
getMoney() - Method in class entities.Spectator
Returns the amount of current money that this Spectator has available for new bets.
getNumberOfHorses() - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Returns number of horses that the BettingCentre has knowledge of.
getNumberOfIncrementsDone() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the current number of increments (iterations) of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey).
getNumberOfTracks() - Method in class hippodrome.actions.Race
Gets the number of tracks which this race has.
getPositionOnTrack() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the current position on track of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey).
getProbabilityToWin() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the current probability to win of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey).
getRace() - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Gets the current Race happening on this Racing Track.
getRaceNumber() - Method in class entities.HorseJockey
Returns the pair Horse/Jockey race number identification, in order to compete in the Racing Track.
getRaceNumber() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Gets the value of the race number.
getStatus() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.HorseJockey
Get the status of this pair Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey).
getStatus() - Method in class hippodrome.registry.Spectator
Get the status of a Spectator.
getWinner() - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Gets the current winner of a race on this Racing Track.
giveFileAName() - Method in class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Gives a name to the logging file.
goCheckHorses() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Signal given by the last Spectator which arrives at the Paddock to appraise the horses, notifying the ControlCentre.summonHorsesToPaddock() of the Broker.
goCheckHorses() - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Signal given by the Broker in order to the Spectators go check the pairs Horse/Jockey and verify if there are more to come.
goCheckHorses(boolean) - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Changes the Spectator's state to Appraising the Horses (ATH) and waits till the last Paddock.proceedToStartLine().
goCollectTheGains() - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Changes the Spectator's state to Collecting the Gains (CTG) and lets a spectator collect all his (or hers) gains after being placed a bet and a race had ended.
goWatchTheRace() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Changes the state of the Spectator to Watching a Race (WAR) and waits till the ControlCentre.reportResults() of the Broker.
